document_title: Curved penis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_name: duong-vat-cong.json_7_Measures to prevent a curved penis
subsection_content:
Any abnormality related to the genitals affects men's psychology and sexual life, including a curved penis. To limit the risk of this condition, men should note:
Prioritize choosing loose and airy underwear. When sleeping, you may not need to wear underwear.; Avoid masturbation or rough sex.; When having sex, men should choose positions that bring the most comfort to both; Do not use stimulants, alcohol and do not smoke; Properly and promptly handle and treat injuries occurring in private areas; Perform screening when a family member has a curved penis.; When experiencing discomfort during urination and sexual intercourse, men need to quickly see a doctor for diagnosis and timely measures. You should go to reputable medical facilities to limit risks in treatment.; Absolutely do not use medications without a doctor's prescription. Especially "word of mouth" folk remedies, whose origin, origin and uses are unknown.
